summary: This document is an email correspondence from Harry Heller to Amanda Kirby regarding the confirmation of shares received for Southern Financial LLC. The email discusses specific financial transactions involving shares of two funds.

persons.context: Harry Heller is following up on a financial transaction related to Southern Financial LLC.

persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the email and is asked to confirm the receipt of shares.
